h2_title: Violet Spider Boss Fight and Guide
content: The poison blast has an extremely wide area of effect, and can be difficult to escape if you're still very close to her when she burrows in. Luckily, as long as you have a lot of stamina saved up, you can also negate the blast by using the Pillar Stance. It will likely take 50% of your stamina bar to soak, but you'll be free of any damage or poison!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Violet_Spider.md', within the main section titled 'Violet Spider', specifically from the subsection 'Violet Spider Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
The poison blast has an extremely wide area of effect, and can be difficult to escape if you're still very close to her when she burrows in. Luckily, as long as you have a lot of stamina saved up, you can also negate the blast by using the Pillar Stance. It will likely take 50% of your stamina bar to soak, but you'll be free of any damage or poison!
